content: Investments Asked by Shabir KhanAsked on 12 Mar 2019Does DBS Vickers Cash Account, allow lending of shares to Short-sellers and if they do what are the fees associated?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 12 Mar 2019DBS Vickers cash account is linked to CDP.CDP allows shares lending or borrowing. But you need a minimum of 50k shares or a value of $50k of the same stock.You get an interest of about 4% per annum if your shares are being lent out by CDP.0 comments1
